data.name: Darker Pirate Bay
data.description:
The Pirate Bay redesigned in dark grays, gradients, CSS3 effects etc.

For more dark designs, check out http://www.zigboom.com

Comments are welcome,

Enjoy!

data.name: Google Search Engine Dark Theme
data.description:
Supports the following components.
- All/Images/Videos/Shopping search
- YouTube videos showcase
- Translate box
- Define box
- Calculator box
- Color picker box
- Unit converter box
- Finance box â³(unsupport finance page)
- Full file picker page.

Todo List (Not supported)
- Full finance page
- Other Google related sites (ex: news.google.com).
